Reviews.Title: Best phone ever
Reviews.Author: Candace G.
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone a few weeks ago for my birthday and I love it. My family say I'm on it so much til I don't really do anything else. I mean this phone has everything that you can think of and it's prepaid. I have absolutely no complaints about it. I think compared to the Iphone, it's the 2nd best thing out right now. And I love how it takes great pictures and it has a camcorder. I don't really even get on the internet anymore because I can do that and more from my phone.

Reviews.Title: This Is A Great Phone For Travel and Home Use
Reviews.Author: A. Ebel "gccradioscience"
Reviews.Content: I got this phone to replace my old phone that I used to have with Cox Communications and T Mobile.  This phone is like my G1, but without the QUERTY keyboard.  The touch screen is just the right size compared to the Samsung Gem that was smaller than this one.  I still have the case for the HTC G1 and the G1 is gone so this phone now fits in the protective case like a glove, so I know this is a great replacement for my G1.  I hope my girlfriend gets one of these phones since it will help her with her smart phone needs.  This phone has a headphone jack, but does not have a mini HDMI output jack to connect to a TV.  It does not have FM radio, but can get internet radio stations and a lot of apps from the google play store.  It's like my T510 tablet, but has a earlier version of Google Android, but most apps work on this phone than my Samsung Gem.  It does load apps quick and I had fun playing games on it.  The reason why I bought this phone is because I used to be a 4 year customer with T-Mobile.  T-Mobile was charging me an arm and a leg and keeping me from upgrading to a new 4G phone.  So going prepaid will help you save more money than staying with the contract. This is good for people who want to stay out of cell phone debt and have more money in your pocket.  It's up to you!

Reviews.Title: The Verizon Illusion
Reviews.Author: kempy
Reviews.Content: Ive purchased the ILLUSION almost a month ago and its the best phone ive owned. It runs perfect with no complaints. I bought the :pay as you go: phone plan so I wasnt commited to contracts. I would most definitely recommend this phone to anyone who wants something simple to use with some extras. I rate this phone a 4.5, Only because I feel no device is perfect.

Reviews.Title: flash
Reviews.Author: richierich 59 "richierich"
Reviews.Content: i have never had a cell phone that did not have a built in flash. This is a great phone but you cant take pictures w/o lights being on or outside at nite,theres NO flash :-)

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Charis Roush
Reviews.Content: My first smart phone and I love everything about it, except the battery runs low quickly.  Charge it every night and you're good to go!

Reviews.Title: Its good but verizon is greedy
Reviews.Author: Y. Hathaway "YvoHath"
Reviews.Content: The phone is good, an entry level android. Verizon is greedy woth $80 a month. When my month of service is up is up I am going to straight talk for $45 a month - they run over the sprint network and it is unlimited for $45,  The phone is good. I do like it but the money is a factor.

Reviews.Title: I Love My Phone...sike
Reviews.Author: Sadies
Reviews.Content: i been with verizion prepaid service since 2006 and i never thought they were going to get any touch screen phones but i had the LG Extervtor i think thats how you spell it but when i would be listeing to music and get a txt i would have to turn my music off just to read my txt but not wirh this phone i can still listen to my music and read txt, tweet, and be on Facebook i love my SAMSUNG ILLUSION i would highly recommend this phone ! if i could give more than 5 stars i would because this phone is a 10 ! THANK YOU!...So it has been 4 months since i had this phone and i keep getting the forced close app and it keeps freezing up im fed up with it now i have a new phone that is on the way now as i type this so if your one that still wants this phone make sure you have alot of patients with it

Reviews.Title: Order online for this one, you save $10.00 per month!!
Reviews.Author: ja
Reviews.Content: Great phone, works well.  In the store it's $99.99 plus $80.00 per month.  If you go online to Verizon Wireless and shop smartphones, prepaid plan, you can get this exact phone for $99.99 and only $70.00 month with 2 gig data.  Save yourself some money.  It's the same phone.

Reviews.Title: Upgrading after less than a year
Reviews.Author: Lora905
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from an LG that had stopped working (mostly due to water damage, & yes had soaked in rice). I figured I'd finally step away from a slide-out phone. For the first month or so, I was impressed and glad I upgraded. Now I despise this phone. Mind you, I just bought this phone brand new in the Verizon store May 24, 2013. By August I started getting the now often repeated question, "Why didn't you answer my text?" My answer: because I never got it. But I found out that if I logged into my Verizon account online, I could see any and all incoming & outgoing messages.Issue #2: Sometimes I'll go to the phone pad to make a call, and when I'm done dialing and hit the green button to connect, it'll go right back to the home screen. Then a minute or 2 later the phone will start dialing the number. Like wth? I was doing the phone reprogram code and/or removing the battery at least once a month.Issue #3: Yesterday I heard this really strange noise coming from my purse, and I realized it was my cell ringing. After I ended the call I tried to reset my ringtone; unfortunately it and the other 2 were gone. I called Verizon and they told me it was a device issue and gave me the number to Samsung (after refunding the amount I had spent on ringtones) The only thing Samsung helped me do was realize that all my pictures had been deleted from my SD card that came with the phone, and that entire folders had been deleted.Combined with the Kindle app only holding my place 50% of the time even when I sync'ed my place, I will be so glad to get rid of this d**n phone.

Reviews.Title: Decent phone for the money...no complaints
Reviews.Author: P. Coggi "KD5GHJ"
Reviews.Content: reliable phone, screen a little smaller than I'd prefer, but it works well and holds the charge for about a day with reasonable use.

Reviews.Title: Love the phone
Reviews.Author: Mikki
Reviews.Content: I got this phone as a mother's day present, I love the phone but it does not hold a charge.I have to charge it at least twice a day.I love the phone because I am not tied down to a 2 years contract.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: If you want a fairly cheap, but nice smartphone for Verizon Prepaid, this is it.  Its has nice volume, nice screen.

Reviews.Title: Must have prepaid
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Bought for my son as an upgrade for his prepaid service, easy set up, back up contact list available and all Internet features. Great but for the price.

Reviews.Title: verizon prepaid samsung illusion
Reviews.Author: rosidragon
Reviews.Content: i've been looking for a while for a prepaid phone..i have a cell phone know but reception sucks..so i figured i would wait till black friday and check out for any good deals..and omg i found the phone its a verizon prepaid samsung illusion i only paid 50.00 and its the best christmas present i got for myself.

Reviews.Title: A great first smartphone. I am very happy!
Reviews.Author: hipmama
Reviews.Content: I adore this phone. This is my very first smartphone because since I don't have a job at the moment, I didn't want to have another bill, and i know those wireless contracts get very out of control very quickly. This phone has all the bells and whistles of any smartphone- I have facebook, my email, web and everything you get a smartphone for. I use Verizon pay as you go on it- that's the best part. Just like my old phone, I buy a card from the drugstore/call and use my debit card to make a montly payment of 60.00- and that's it. No contracts, no bills, and it's actually cheaper than the old phone I had which had no smartphone capability and charged PER LINE OF TEXT... and I got to keep my old number. I finally feel like I'm with the times.The phone is easy to use, looks great, and has options galore. I don't care for the 'bloatware' on it but my brother says that's pretty standard with most devices now... it's easy to handle ergonomincally and it looks great.

Reviews.Title: wonderful phone
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Anne Hawkins-hyduke "jinx1027"
Reviews.Content: This is the best phone I have ever had. It is easy to use and very efficient. If I lost it, I would def. buy a new illusion.

Reviews.Title: works good for a prepaid but not exactly what i wanted
Reviews.Author: donaldludwig
Reviews.Content: its not exactly what i wanted but it works really well..I rated this because I am happy with it...and if the Illusion is what you want I would recommend it

Reviews.Title: No good
Reviews.Author: gladys giordano
Reviews.Content: Very hard to text, very hard to figure out. I regret this buy. Is the worse phone. I should follow the reviews. Nothing good about it. Is a horrible "Illusion". I wasted my money. I am saving to get something better.

Reviews.Title: samsung illusion phone review
Reviews.Author: PAT W.
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone even though the bluetooth won't work on it.  It is easy to use and itiot proof

Reviews.Title: love this phone
Reviews.Author: Abby Friedman
Reviews.Content: I have ha d the same phone for over a yr when it started during .unfortunate samsung does n it make them anymore so I got on Amazon and found Sam we phone grass. Great camera slot for  a memory card . Takes good quality pictures . Please make sure if your looking for pre pay it says pre pay . And m make sure according to verizon  you wait till it  you r warranty is up on phone. Or else u won't be able to keep number and u pay again to activate it including plan .

Reviews.Title: Samsung Illusion
Reviews.Author: SEXY RED
Reviews.Content: This was my first Android. I love it! The phone is high tech and very good quality. I was disapppinted that the phone did not have face front. I can work around that because it has everything else that anyone would need.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Illusion Prepaid Android Phone
Reviews.Author: linda cripp
Reviews.Content: I like anything that Samsung has put out. Their workmanship is always excellent.I would recommend this product to anyone who needs a good cell phone

Reviews.Title: Only pre-paid phone to have.
Reviews.Author: Animal Lover
Reviews.Content: This is the 1st android phone and I love it. It is a pre-paid phone which costs minimum of 80.00. a month though. I have not had any problems

Reviews.Title: love my samsung Illusion
Reviews.Author: gp
Reviews.Content: I love my phone I agree wish it had camra flash and less monthly bill other than that great pre paid smart phone I love its apps and covers amazon got many to chose from so cheap myface so awesome !

Reviews.Title: They didn't mention that it's a CDMA phone
Reviews.Author: Yuriy S.
Reviews.Content: Great phone, feels nice in my hand, looks like a mini Google Nexus 4.The phone looks like  higher quality device to galaxy S Vibrant, Captivate or i9000.CONS: bad camera, microSDcard slot is accesible from outside.IT'S a CDMA phone!!!  It has no custom roms, there is no way to root the device at this moment, there is no android developers interested into working on this phone.

Reviews.Title: dont work
Reviews.Author: Dana
Reviews.Content: The phone is locked so you cant turn it on.  So called around to Verizon and other place. They say you can get them unlocked that it should have been done when it was paid for. So now I have a phone that will never work and im out that money.

Reviews.Title: Cheap price but not worth it.
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Dorrell "jend954"
Reviews.Content: My husband and I bought 2 of these phones, one for each of us. He agrees that this phone isn't very good. I am tech savvy so I know that you can't expect a lot from the cheaper phones. I don't recommend this phone, not even for a kid or anyone that wants to actually use this phone to make phone calls. The phone can't handle any applications or playing games or using it as a navigator. Don't add or install anything or it will be even slower than it already is. Don't take pictures, you can't store them or share them unless you get at least 4 GB of extra memory. Don't rely on the phone to ring when you get a call, most likely you will get a voicemail of a missed call, but no alert of a call or a missed call. This has made my friends and family think I'm ignoring them, all the while I have no idea that anyone is even trying to reach me. Text messaging is not fun, the keyboard is horrible, and if you have Verizon don't expect to communicate with text messages. Most of the time they don't go through and you have to resend. If you want to share or receive a picture, it usually takes a day for me to receive or send just one.It's about as useful as a paper weight and I'd rather use a couple of cans attached by string if I had an emergency.

Reviews.Title: services
Reviews.Author: martika
Reviews.Content: Can this phone be used with straight talk? Im looking to buy this phone but I have straight talk service I want to know for sure before I purchase it.

Reviews.Title: question
Reviews.Author: kisha lovett
Reviews.Content: I have straight talk and am lookin for a new phone. I was wanderinng if this illusion phone can be used as straightalk

Reviews.Title: page plus is not VZ pre paid
Reviews.Author: Ke
Reviews.Content: I tried to order a page plus phone but instead I got a Verizon pre-paid phone (not the same) it worked out in the end. I'm much happier with VZ pre paid than I was with page plus. just make sure that you search for page plus phones so you don't make the same mistake I do

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Ortegaalro5
Reviews.Content: We bought this phone for our 13 yr old but due to our mistake, were not aware that since it was a pre paid phone it could not be put on our verizon monthly plan with an old number we had :( beautiful phone in new condition and shipped promptly. We returned for a full refund and were very pleased with the response and courtesy of the person we dealt with! Too bad we couldn't use it! We wouldn't hesitate to order from this seller again :)

Reviews.Title: NOT HAPPY!
Reviews.Author: ThanayiR
Reviews.Content: For a pre-paid, it's an "okay" phone. The features are cool. My T-Mobile phone rang louder and had a few more features than this one as far as texting. I'm semi - happy with this phone BUT, it doesn't ring loud AT ALL. Starting to wonder if I'm going deaf :(

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: tim sobolik
Reviews.Content: These phones are junk. I bought three and there crap.yoj ha e to up date your phone e ery day and remove the battery at least o.ce a weekIt sucks

Reviews.Title: WORST PHONE EVER
Reviews.Author: SLC
Reviews.Content: Worst phone ever. There is a REASON Verizon gives this phone away as a FREE upgrade. I cant even begin to list the ways this phone sucks, itll take too long. Dont waste your money or free upgrade on this phone... trust me, keep looking.

Reviews.Title: Totally Sucks!!
Reviews.Author: Carolina
Reviews.Content: I am very sad. Because I live in Costa Rica and this telephone not work in Latin America because this has not chip slot and in any part of the description said that , that only can use in USA and that dont have chip slot. So I  buy something that I cant use. So please specific that in the description. And one more thing the package not bring the microsd card and suposs that the box bring one.

ProductInfo.Features:
OS: Android 2.3, Gingerbread
Integrated Google Mobile Services, Microsoft Outlook Exchange (contacts and calendars), Social Networking Integration (contacts and calendars)
3.0MP camera with camcorder
Enjoy yourself anywhere, anytime, right from your Illusion. Browse through over 250,000 apps and games available through Google Play
What's in the box: Samsung Illusion, battery, microSD card, charger, safety and warranty card, and starter guide
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Illusion Prepaid Android Phone (Verizon Wireless)
